subtitle.line1: Relive, share, and keep your best memories safe, all in one place.
subtitle.line2: Let Internxt Photos focus on privacy and security,
subtitle.line3: so you can concentrate on capturing the moments that matter to you.

subtitle.line1: Your photo library will always be up to
subtitle.line2: date on all your devices. This means that
subtitle.line3: you can access your synced photos even
subtitle.line4: when your device is lost, stolen, or broken.

subtitle.line1: Generate a share link so you can
subtitle.line2: control how many times a photo

subtitle.line1: Privacy and security are our core, we don’t run our business on data or advertising,
subtitle.line2: but on trust. We respect your rights and build amazing tools around them, not against them.

card1.title: Military-grade encryption
card1.subtitle: We take your privacy very seriously, that’s why your files are encrypted so only you can access your files.

card2.title: Zero-knowledge technology
card2.subtitle: We never store or transmit files, user passwords, or encryption keys in an unencrypted or unhashed form.

card3.title: Privacy by design
card3.subtitle: We develop our products with the user in mind, and their privacy is a must in the data-driven world we live in.

card4.title: Open source and transparent
card4.subtitle: We are proud of what we do, so our code is made public on GitHub and can be personally reviewed, audited, and verified by anyone. We have nothing to hide but your data.

FeatureSection.title: Protect your pics with Internxt Photos
FeatureSection.description: With Internxt, you are the absolute only one with access to your files. Store, share, and back up your images in complete privacy.

faq.question: How do I sync my files and photos in Internxt?
answer: To sync and encrypt your photos from your phone library to the Internxt cloud, simply:
2.Select 'Photos' and your photos will start syncing automatically

faq.question: How can I upload files from my phone?
answer: Open the Internxt mobile app, and tap the blue plus (+) icon at the bottom-center of the screen. Select 'Upload files' or 'Upload from camera roll' to upload a photo.

CtaSection.title: Try Internxt risk-free
CtaSection.description: Protect the really important stuff with Internxt's secure, private, and encrypted cloud storage.
